definition: to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Thekeydriver behind the increase will come from basic set-top boxes.
sentences.chinese: 增长背后的主要驱动力来自于基础机顶盒市场。

sentences.english: Succesful rebalancing is in balancing to domestic drivers of growth.
sentences.chinese: 成功的再平衡是在平衡国内增长的驱动力。

sentences.english: Motivation Forces that energize, direct, and sustain a person's efforts.
sentences.chinese: 鼓舞，指引和维持个人努力行为的驱动力。

sentences.english: Balance combines good reach in forequarters with strong drive in hindquarters.
sentences.chinese: 充分的前躯伸展和强大的后躯驱动力配合默契。

sentences.english: Libra Midheaven: Comfortable working conditions are a must, and this position is motivated by money.
sentences.chinese: 需要舒适的工作环境，可能金钱是你工作的驱动力。

sentences.english: The forces driving the globalization of unhealthy lifestyles are too powerful.
sentences.chinese: 促使不健康生活方式全球化的驱动力极为强大。

sentences.english: At a moderate trot the hind legs are powerful and propelling.
sentences.chinese: 在中速小跑时，后腿提供了强大的驱动力。

sentences.english: The costs and value drivers are identified for each value activity.
sentences.chinese: 攻势要检查每项价值创造活动的成本和价值驱动力。

sentences.english: To break them will definitely unleash enormous driving force for the economy.
sentences.chinese: 如果突破这些瓶颈，势必会释放巨大的经济驱动力。

sentences.english: That is the ideological driving force of health-care reform in America.
sentences.chinese: 那是美国医改的意识形态驱动力。

sentences.english: Creative unique tool pot supporting and also process the minimum driving power of same level tool magazine.
sentences.chinese: 创新独特刀套支撑方式，拥有小于同级刀库的驱动力。

sentences.english: This is largely driven by the remoteness of ANZ locations and the high cost of resources.
sentences.chinese: ANZ的位置偏远和资源成本高是主要的驱动力。

sentences.english: Gaus was convinced that the real drivers were psychological.
sentences.chinese: 他相信，真正的驱动力是心理。

sentences.english: Sallow is a major driving force in Iowa's diversified ethnic community.
sentences.chinese: 燕晓哲是爱荷华多民族社区的主要发展驱动力。

sentences.english: The drive force of phase change for HgCdTe growth during recrystallization is briefly described.
sentences.chinese: 简述了再结晶过程中晶粒长大的相变驱动力。

sentences.english: The reach of the forequarters must compensate for and be in balance with the driving power of the hindquarters.
sentences.chinese: 前躯的伸展应该与后躯的驱动力相互匹配并保持平衡。

definition: to drive/to propel/drive (vehicle wheel)/drive mechanism (tape or disk)/device driver (computing software)
(physics) inertia/(fig.) force of habit/tendency to do things in the accustomed way/habitual
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
